channel.title: Nxtscape Browser
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.5.0
item.description:
Nxtscape 0.5.0 - The Open-source Agentic Browser

Built on Chromium with AI superpowers.

Key Features

  • 🤖 AI agents that run locally - automate tasks without sending data to the cloud
  • 💬 Local AI chat - chat with AI in the sidebar using local models
  • 🔍 Smart search - instantly find anything you've seen before
  • 🏠 Chrome extension compatible - works with all your existing extensions
  • 🤝 MCP tools support - works with Model Context Protocol out of the box
  • 🛡️ Built-in AI ad blocker - browse without ads and trackers
  • 🔒 100% private - your browsing history stays on your machine
  • 🔓 Open source - see exactly what's happening under the hood

System Requirements

  • macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Apple Silicon or Intel Mac
